StringProperty.Name: RootNamespace
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the default namespace to be used with new files created in this project.

EnumProperty.Name: CppWinRTVerbosity
EnumProperty.Description: Sets the importance of C++/WinRT build messages

EnumValue.Name: low
EnumValue.Description: Enables messages when MSBuild verbosity is set to at least 'detailed'

EnumValue.Name: normal
EnumValue.Description: Enables messages when MSBuild verbosity is set to at least 'normal'

EnumValue.Name: high
EnumValue.Description: Enables messages when MSBuild verbosity is set to at least 'minimal'

EnumProperty.Name: CppWinRTProjectLanguage
EnumProperty.Description: Sets the C++ dialect for the project. C++/WinRT provides full projection support, C++/CX permits consuming projection headers.

EnumValue.Name: C++/WinRT
EnumValue.Description: Enables full consuming and producing projection support and Xaml integration

EnumValue.Name: C++/CX
EnumValue.Description: Enables C++/CX code to generate and use consuming projections

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTLibs
BoolProperty.Description: Adds the WindowsApp.lib umbrella library for Windows Runtime imports

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTModernIDL
BoolProperty.Description: Enables midlrt.exe modern IDL support (disable for custom behavior such as proxy/stub generation)

IntProperty.Name: CppWinRTNamespaceMergeDepth
IntProperty.Description: Overrides the depth of mdmerge.exe namespace merging (Xaml apps require 1)

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTRootNamespaceAutoMerge
BoolProperty.Description: Use the Root Namespace as the default merge depth

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTUsePrefixes
BoolProperty.Description: Uses a dotted prefix namespace convention (versus a nested folder convention)

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTFastAbi
BoolProperty.Description: Enables Fast ABI feature for both consuming and producing projections

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTOptimized
BoolProperty.Description: Enables component projection optimization features (e.g., unified construction)

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTGenerateWindowsMetadata
BoolProperty.Description: Enables or disables the generation of Windows Metadata

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTEnableDefaultCopyLocalFalse
BoolProperty.Description: Enables or disables the default for copying binaries to the output folder to be false

BoolProperty.Name: CppWinRTEnableLegacyCoroutines
BoolProperty.Description: Enables the /await compiler option (disable this if you want to pass this yourself)
